verses.verse: שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> ye the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> speaketh יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> unto בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto you O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> not the way הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the heathen אַל־ <WH408> not תִּלְמָ֔דוּ <WH3925> Learn וּמֵאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> at the signs הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <WH2865> and be not dismayed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Although יֵחַ֥תּוּ <WH2865> are dismayed הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> for the heathen מֵהֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> at them

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> For the customs הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> of the people הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> [are] vain ה֑וּא <WH1931> he כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עֵץ֙ <WH6086> a tree מִיַּ֣עַר <WH3293> out of the forest כְּרָת֔וֹ <WH3772> for [one] cutteth מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֥י־ <WH3027> of the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> of the workman בַּֽמַּעֲצָֽד׃ <WH4621> with the axe

בְּכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> it with silver וּבְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and with gold יְיַפֵּ֑הוּ <WH3302> They deck בְּמַסְמְר֧וֹת <WH4548> it with nails וּבְמַקָּב֛וֹת <WH4717> and with hammers יְחַזְּק֖וּם <WH2388> they fasten וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> not יָפִֽיק׃ <WH6328> that it move

כְּתֹ֨מֶר <WH8560> as the palm tree מִקְשָׁ֥ה <WH4749> They [are] upright הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> and they וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> but speak נָשׂ֥וֹא <WH5375> not they must needs יִנָּשׂ֖וּא <WH5375> be borne כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִצְעָ֑דוּ <WH6805> because they cannot go אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> Be not afraid מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like כִּי־ <WH3588> Because לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָרֵ֔עוּ <WH7489> of them for they cannot do evil וְגַם־ <WH1571> any הֵיטֵ֖יב <WH3190> neither also [is it] in them to do good אֵ֥ין <WH369> else אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH854> for ס

מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> like יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Forasmuch as [there is] none like unto thee O LORD גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> thou [art] great אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you וְגָד֥וֹל <WH1419> [is] great שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> and thy name בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃ <WH1369> in might

מִ֣י <WH4310> Who לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִֽרָאֲךָ֙ <WH3372> Who would not fear מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> thee O King הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> [men] of the nations כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְךָ֖ יָאָ֑תָה <WH2969> is your due כִּ֣י <WH3588> among בְכָל־ <WH3605> all חַכְמֵ֧י <WH2450> forasmuch as among all the wise הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> of the nations וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכוּתָ֖ם <WH4438> and in all their kingdoms מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> There כָּמֽוֹךָ׃ <WH3644> like

וּבְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> But they are altogether יִבְעֲר֣וּ <WH1197> brutish וְיִכְסָ֑לוּ <WH3688> and foolish מוּסַ֥ר <WH4148> [is] a doctrine הֲבָלִ֖ים <WH1892> of vanities עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> the stock הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> Silver מְרֻקָּ֞ע <WH7554> spread into plates מִתַּרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <WH8659> from Tarshish יוּבָ֗א <WH935> is brought וְזָהָב֙ <WH2091> and gold מֵֽאוּפָ֔ז <WH210> from Uphaz מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work חָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> of the workman וִידֵ֣י <WH3027> and of the hands צוֹרֵ֑ף <WH6884> of the founder תְּכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> and purple לְבוּשָׁ֔ם <WH3830> [is] their clothing מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> they [are] all the work חֲכָמִ֖ים <WH2450> of cunning כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> are all

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> But the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> [is] the true הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> he [is] the living וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and an everlasting מִקִּצְפּוֹ֙ <WH7110> at his wrath תִּרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> shall tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יָכִ֥לוּ <WH3557> shall not be able to abide גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> and the nations זַעְמֽוֹ׃ <WH2195> his indignation ס

כִּדְנָה֙ <WH1836> Thus תֵּאמְר֣וּן <WH560> shall ye say לְה֔וֹם אֱלָ֣הַיָּ֔א <WH426> unto them The gods דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch שְׁמַיָּ֥א <WH8065> the heavens וְאַרְקָ֖א <WH778> and the earth לָ֣א <WH3809> that have not עֲבַ֑דוּ <WH5648> made יֵאבַ֧דוּ <WH7> [even] they shall perish מֵֽאַרְעָ֛א <WH772> from the earth וּמִן־ <WH4481> and from תְּח֥וֹת <WH8460> and from under שְׁמַיָּ֖א <WH8065> heavens אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH429> these ס

עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> He hath made אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the earth בְּכֹח֔וֹ <WH3581> by his power מֵכִ֥ין <WH3559> he hath established תֵּבֵ֖ל <WH8398> the world בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <WH2451> by his wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָת֖וֹ <WH8394> by his discretion נָטָ֥ה <WH5186> and hath stretched out שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> the heavens

לְק֨וֹל <WH6963> his voice תִּתּ֜וֹ <WH5414> When he uttereth הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> [there is] a multitude מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of waters בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> in the heavens וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> to ascend נְשִׂאִ֖ים <WH5387> and he causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> from the ends [אֶרֶץ כ] (הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> common ק) בְּרָקִ֤ים <WH1300> lightnings לַמָּטָר֙ <WH4306> with rain עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> he maketh וַיּ֥וֹצֵא <WH3318> and bringeth forth ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> the wind מֵאֹצְרֹתָֽיו׃ <WH214> out of his treasures

נִבְעַ֤ר <WH1197> is brutish כָּל־ <WH3605> Every אָדָם֙ <WH120> Every man מִדַּ֔עַת <WH1847> in [his] knowledge הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is confounded כָּל־ <WH3605> Every צוֹרֵ֖ף <WH6884> every founder מִפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> by the graven image כִּ֛י <WH3588> for שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> [is] falsehood נִסְכּ֖וֹ <WH5262> for his molten image וְלֹא־ <WH3808> is no ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> and [there is] no breath בָּֽם׃

הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> They [are] vanity הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> [and] the work תַּעְתֻּעִ֑ים <WH8595> of errors בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> of their visitation יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> they shall perish

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> like כְאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these חֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> The portion יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יוֹצֵ֤ר <WH3335> [is] not like them for he [is] the former הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all ה֔וּא <WH1931> is He וְיִ֨שְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of all [things] and Israel שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> [is] the rod נַֽחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> of his inheritance יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name ס
אִסְפִּ֥י <WH622> Gather up מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> out of the land כִּנְעָתֵ֑ךְ <WH3666> thy wares [יֹשַׁבְתִּי כ] (יֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> abide ק) בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <WH4692> of the fortress ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold קוֹלֵ֛עַ <WH7049> Behold I will sling אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> out the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> at this once הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וַהֲצֵר֥וֹתִי <WH6887> and will distress לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of יִמְצָֽאוּ׃ <WH4672> them that they may find ס

א֥וֹי <WH188> Woe לִי֙ עַל־ <WH5921> because שִׁבְרִ֔י <WH7667> is me for my hurt נַחְלָ֖ה <WH2470> is grievous מַכָּתִ֑י <WH4347> my wound וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> but I said אַ֛ךְ <WH389> Truly זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this חֳלִ֖י <WH2483> this [is] a grief וְאֶשָּׂאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5375> and I must bear

אָהֳלִ֣י <WH168> My tabernacle שֻׁדָּ֔ד <WH7703> is spoiled וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מֵיתָרַ֖י <WH4340> and all my cords נִתָּ֑קוּ <WH5423> are broken בָּנַ֤י <WH1121> my children יְצָאֻ֙נִי֙ <WH3318> are gone forth וְאֵינָ֔ם <WH369> no אֵין־ <WH369> more נֹטֶ֥ה <WH5186> of me and they [are] not [there is] none to stretch forth עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again אָהֳלִ֔י <WH168> my tent וּמֵקִ֖ים <WH6965> any more and to set up יְרִיעוֹתָֽי׃ <WH3407> my curtains

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִבְעֲרוּ֙ <WH1197> are become brutish הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> For the pastors וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> not דָרָ֑שׁוּ <WH1875> and have not sought עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not הִשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <WH7919> therefore they shall not prosper וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַרְעִיתָ֖ם <WH4830> and all their flocks נָפֽוֹצָה׃ <WH6327> shall be scattered ס

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Behold the noise שְׁמוּעָה֙ <WH8052> of the bruit הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold בָאָ֔ה <WH935> is come וְרַ֥עַשׁ <WH7494> commotion גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and a great מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> out of the north לָשׂ֞וּם <WH7760> to make אֶת־ <WH853> עָרֵ֧י <WH5892> the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> desolate מְע֥וֹן <WH4583> [and] a den תַּנִּֽים׃ <WH8577> of dragons ס

יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> I know יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor לָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> that the way לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [is] not in himself [it is] not in man הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> that walketh וְהָכִ֖ין <WH3559> to direct אֶֽת־ <WH853> צַעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH6806> his steps

יַסְּרֵ֥נִי <WH3256> correct יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD אַךְ־ <WH389> but בְּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> me but with judgment אַל־ <WH408> nay בְּאַפְּךָ֖ <WH639> not in thine anger פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תַּמְעִטֵֽנִי׃ <WH4591> lest thou bring me to nothing

שְׁפֹ֣ךְ <WH8210> Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֗ <WH2534> thy fury עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְדָע֔וּךָ <WH3045> that know וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and on מִשְׁפָּח֔וֹת <WH4940> thee not and upon the families אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> your בְּשִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> not on thy name לֹ֣א <WH3808> not קָרָ֑אוּ <WH7121> that call כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָכְל֣וּ <WH398> for they have eaten up אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> Jacob וַאֲכָלֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH398> and devoured וַיְכַלֻּ֔הוּ <WH3615> him and consumed וְאֶת־ <WH853> נָוֵ֖הוּ <WH5116> him and have made his habitation הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <WH8074> desolate פ
